short_summary: The Department of National Defense wants to buy a colour wide format multifunction printer.
description: The requested equipment is a high end color wide format multifunction printer to be used in the Department of National Defence. This contract is for the supply, delivery, and installation of the equipment, as well as training in English that allows users to use the required features of the equipment. This is the third amendment issued for this RFx. Figures and specifications from the prior amendments are incorporated into this document as necessary.
full_summary:
### Colour Wide Format Multifunction Printer for the Department of National Defence

#### Government Tender Announcement

A solicitation notice has been issued by Shared Services Canada (SSC) for the procurement of a colour wide format multifunction printer for the Department of National Defence. The contract will cover the supply, delivery, and installation of the equipment, as well as training in English to ensure users can access all the required features of the printer.

**Contract Details**

* Reference number: SSC-23-00021204:T
* Tender title: Colour Wide Format Multifunction Printer for the Department of National Defence
* Amendment number: 3
* Solicitation number: BPM017706/21204
* Publication date: January 2, 2023
* Tender closing date: January 23, 2023, at 14:00 (local time)
* Amendment date: January 12, 2023
* Procurement category: Goods and Services (SRVTGD)
* Tender status: Expired

**Tender Information**

* Procurement method: Competitive – Open bidding
* Notice type: Request for Proposal
* Regions of opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of delivery: Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)
* Contact information:
	+ Name: Jesse Squirrell
	+ Email: [jesse.squirrell@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:jesse.squirrell@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: 613-791-6257
	+ Fax: 000-000-0000
	+ Address: 400 Cooper St, Ottawa, ON, K2P 2H8

**Tender Documents**

The tender documents, including the solicitation notice and technical specifications, are available for download on the Shared Services Canada website.

**Important Dates**

* Tender closing date: January 23, 2023, at 14:00 (local time)
* Amendment date: January 12, 2023

Note that the original text was rewritten to improve clarity, grammar, and formatting. The rewritten text should be more suitable for a government tender announcement. Let me know if you have any further requests! 

It appears that their tender is now expired, however, in case other pertners are interested to obtain a Colour Wide Format Multifunction Printer, this area of opportunity has been and remains open for other solutions.
